  box-sizing: border-box; }

.dropzone {
  min-height: 150px;
  border: 2px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  background: white;
  padding: 20px 20px; }

    cursor: pointer; }
    .dropzone.dz-clickable * {
      cursor: default; }
    .dropzone.dz-clickable .dz-message, .dropzone.dz-clickable .dz-message * {
      cursor: pointer; }

    display: none; }

    border-style: solid; }
    .dropzone.dz-drag-hover .dz-message {
      opacity: 0.5; }

.dropzone, .dropzone * {
  box-sizing: border-box; }

.dropzone {
  min-height: 150px;
  border: 2px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  background: white;
  padding: 20px 20px; }

    cursor: pointer; }
    .dropzone.dz-clickable * {
      cursor: default; }
    .dropzone.dz-clickable .dz-message, .dropzone.dz-clickable .dz-message * {
      cursor: pointer; }

    display: none; }

    border-style: solid; }
    .dropzone.dz-drag-hover .dz-message {
      opacity: 0.5; }

.dropzone, .dropzone * {
  box-sizing: border-box; }

.dropzone {
  min-height: 150px;
  border: 2px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  background: white;
  padding: 20px 20px; }

    cursor: pointer; }
    .dropzone.dz-clickable * {
      cursor: default; }
    .dropzone.dz-clickable .dz-message, .dropzone.dz-clickable .dz-message * {
      cursor: pointer; }

    display: none; }

    border-style: solid; }

      opacity: 0.5; }

.dropzone, .dropzone * {
  box-sizing: border-box; }

.dropzone {
  min-height: 150px;
  border: 2px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  background: white;
  padding: 20px 20px; }

    cursor: pointer; }
    .dropzone.dz-clickable * {
      cursor: default; }
    .dropzone.dz-clickable .dz-message, .dropzone.dz-clickable .dz-message * {
      cursor: pointer; }

    display: none; }

    border-style: solid; }

      opacity: 0.5; }
